name: mybookstore
description: * MybookStore is a demo web based app where customers can search through the website an add book to their wishlist. customers can browse any types of book by the tittle and author.  ## MVP Goals * Create a home page and see a search form * User enters a term and submits a form  * Setup Database  * Create books model and table  * create RESTful routing * Add functionality to the routes * Link the login forms to the login fields * On submit button clicked, the user will be created in the database and userId cookie is set to that user's id
